memberdef.name: CHECK_DUBINS
memberdef.initializer: real_type ll{l1+l2+l3}; \ if ( ll < min_len ) { min_len=ll; L1=l1; L2=l2; L3=l3; type=DubinsType::TYPE; }

memberdef.name: DUBINS_SELECT
memberdef.initializer: if ( s < m_C0.length() ) return m_C0.FUN(s); \ s -= m_C0.length(); \ if ( s < m_C1.length() ) return m_C1.FUN(s); \ s -= m_C1.length(); \ return m_C2.FUN(s)

memberdef.name: DUBINS_SELECT_EVAL
OFFSET_ROOT
memberdef.initializer: real_type p, dp; \ Q.eval( x, p, dp ); \ x += 1e-4 * (dp > 0?1:-1)
